items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
items.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

items.content_html: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.
items.title: OpCodeWolf/rss-api-server: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: Ankhur Terminal is a lightweight and scalable multi-chain co-pilot designed to simplify your Web3 journey across Solana, Base, Optimism, and Arbitrum. Powered by advanced AI capabilities, Ankhur helps you manage blockchain operations, analyze trends, and engage seamlessly on social media platforms like Twitter and Telegram.
